      • createProjectionMatrix

        public static org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f createProjectionMatrix(float width,
                                                    float height,
                                                    float fieldOfView,
                                                    float zNear,
                                                    float zFar)
        Creates a projection matrix
        Parameters:
        width - width of the view, in pixels
        height - height of the view, in pixels
        fieldOfView - angle between the camera's relative z axis and the outermost edge of view
        zNear - distance between the camera (camera origin) and the near view plane
        zFar - distance between the camera (camera origin) and the far view plane
        Returns:
        the projection matrix

      • createCameraMatrix

        public static org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f createCameraMatrix(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f forward,
                                                org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f up)
        Generates an inital camera matrix
        Parameters:
        forward - the vector describing forward in the 3D space
        up - the vector describing up in the 3D space
        Returns:
        the camera matrix
